@graph.headline: Using STS (Strategic Text Sequences) For Ecommerce Product Descriptions With OptizenAI
@graph.description: Learn how to use Strategic Text Sequences (STS) with the Greedy Coordinate Gradient algorithm to optimize product descriptions for AI search engines like Google SGE using OptizenAI.

citation.name: Using STS (Strategic Text Sequences) With The Aim Of Manipulating LLMs In Search

@graph.name: Using STS (Strategic Text Sequences) For Ecommerce Product Descriptions With OptizenAI
How to Use STS Prompt for Product Descriptions
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to implement Strategic Text Sequences using OptizenAI for Shopify product descriptions

step.name: Navigate to Product Tab
step.text: Navigate to the 'product' tab in Optizen AI. Search via name or using tags for the product or products you wish to update. Use the check boxes to select the products.

step.name: Select STS Prompt
step.text: Select the 'Product Description With STS Prefix' from the drop down under the Product Description prompt field. Ensure you are using the prompt repository tab. Be sure to check the box for 'Update this section'. Then click Proceed.

step.name: Review and Apply Changes
step.text: On completion of the prompt, check the output using the Log section of the app. You can then choose to keep or restore the update.

@graph.name: STS Implementation Steps
@graph.description: Complete list of steps for implementing Strategic Text Sequences
